8FD26A8E4B9EEEDB889CF383F3617324: Enables events based on a generic volume.
BF6C68DC48FAF83B5D9212BF7CCC3FB6: Enables events based on a generic volume.
80A49C23471E8479948646B7B18BF5F8: Sends an event to linked devices when an allowed entity enters the volume.
B0D9F06346DB6417F7DECEA021E30694: Sends an event to linked devices when an allowed entity exits the volume.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_Volume_C.ExternalVolume.Descripti: Allows a volume to use another volume as its own for triggering purposes.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Volume_C.CustomVolumeMesh.Descrip: Assigns a custom mesh for the volume to use, rather than a shape.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Volume_C.Invert Class Selection.D: Determines if all classes except the selected class are affected by this volume.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Volume_C.Invert Team Selection.De: Determines if all teams except the selected team are affected by this volume.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Volume_C.CreatureAndWildlifeEvent: Determines if creatures and wildlife trigger enter or exit events.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Volume_C.GuardEventsEnabled.Descr: Determines if guards trigger enter and exit events.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Volume_C.VehicleEventsEnabled.Des: Determines if vehicles trigger enter and exit events.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Volume_C.VolumeShape.Description: Determines the shape of the volume.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Volume_C.SelectedClass.Descriptio: Determines what class is affected by this volume.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Volume_C.SelectedTeam.Description: Determines what team is affected by this volume.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Volume_C.VisibleInGame.Descriptio: Determines whether the volume is visible in game.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Volume_C.PlayerEventsEnabled.Desc: Determines whether the volume triggers entered and exit events.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Volume_C.Use Custom Shape.Descrip: If set, the volume will use a custom mesh rather than a shape.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Volume_C.VolumeRadius.Description: The radius of the volume when using the sphere or cylinder.
